question: Which among the following is the work of Karl Marx?
option2: A Contribution to the Critique of Political Economy
explanation:
The Poverty of Philosophy was published in 1847 by Karl Marx in Paris and Brussels. This book analyses the Capitalist system of production and distribution as well as law of value.
A Contribution to the Critique of Political Economy was published in 1859 by Karl Marx which was an analysis of capitalism and quantity theory of money.
The Civil War in France published in 1871, was a pamphlet written by Karl Marx.
